name: Climate Control (Ryzh)
description:
This is a game made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 152. The world has fallen into climate chaos. You need to collect supplies to provide for your family and seek shelter from the harsh weather. WASD to move. First Game Jam btw.

Assets:

SFX - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/thunderstorms-sfx-pack-149736

TileSet- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/backyard-top-down-tileset-53854

Music- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/loop-music-free-111896
